api_list.name: market/get-movers
api_list.description: Get latest information of movers in the market

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../market/auto-complete endpoint.

api_list.name: stories/detail

required_parameters.name: internalID
required_parameters.description: Get suitable value from .../stories/list or .../news/list or .../news/list-by-region endpoints

api_list.name: news/list

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed markets|technology|view|pursuits|politics|green|citylab|businessweek|fixed-income|hyperdrive|cryptocurrencies|wealth|latest|personalFinance|quickTake|world|industries|stocks|currencies|brexit

api_list.name: news/list-by-region
api_list.description: List latest news from different categories and grouped by region

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed home-v3|asia-home-v3|europe-home-v3|middle-east-home-v3|africa-home-v3|canada-home-v3

api_list.name: market/get-cross-currencies

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The currency code, separated by comma to query multiple currencies at once

api_list.name: market/get-price-chart
api_list.description: Get related data to draw price chart

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../market/auto-complete endpoint.

api_list.name: market/get-chart
api_list.description: Get related data for drawing chart

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../market/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: stories/list
api_list.description: Get a list of stories related to a sticker

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../market/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: stock/get-financials

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of stickers, use market/auto-complete API to get correct values

api_list.name: market/auto-complete
api_list.description: Query suggestion by term and phrase

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: name of company, stock, organization, etc...

api_list.name: market/get-full
api_list.description: Get all field and information about tickers

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../market/auto-complete endpoint, separated by comma to query multiple stickers at once.

api_list.name: market/get-compact
api_list.description: Get most informative fields about indices, commodities, currencies, rates, etc...

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../market/auto-complete endpoint, separated by comma to query multiple stickers at once.

api_list.name: stock/get-statistics

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of stickers, use market/auto-complete API to get correct values
